solution_line_template: If the moon land had the same value as earth land it would be worth {moon_value_if_same_as_earth} billion because {earth_total_value} / {moon_surface_area_ratio_denominator} = <<{earth_total_value}/{moon_surface_area_ratio_denominator}={moon_value_if_same_as_earth}>>{moon_value_if_same_as_earth}

The moon's total land value is {total_moon_land_value} billion because {moon_value_if_same_as_earth} x {moon_land_value_multiplier} = <<{moon_value_if_same_as_earth}*{moon_land_value_multiplier}={total_moon_land_value}>>{total_moon_land_value}
